member.name: M:TwitterStats.Controllers.TwitterStatsController.StartStreaming(System.Int32)
member.param: configures the stream to stop at the provided sample size

member.name: M:TwitterStats.Controllers.TwitterStatsController.GetSampleCollectionStatus
member.summary: Get the Status of the Twitter Stream Collection Process
member.returns: a string indicating the state of the collection process

member.name: M:TwitterStats.Controllers.TwitterStatsController.GetSampleCollection
member.summary: Gets the sample Twitter data collected.

member.name: M:TwitterStats.Controllers.TwitterStatsController.GetUrlListFromCollection
member.summary: Gets a list of url objects from the sample collection
member.returns: A list of Twitter Url Entities

member.name: M:TwitterStats.Controllers.TwitterStatsController.GetDomainListFromCollection
member.summary: Gets a list of domain entites from the sample collection

member.name: M:TwitterStats.Controllers.TwitterStatsController.GetDomainCounts
member.summary: Gets a list of domains and the count of their occurances from a Twitter sample collection
